description: A young couple has brought life back to this old country inn, retaining its rustic ambience while introducing a menu which focuses on creativity and innovation. Claudio creates a host of meat, fish and vegetable dishes with imagination and originality, while one of the highlights remains the menu dedicated to donkey meat.
